items.title: Judge to weigh plea deal of funeral home owner accused of stashing decaying bodies
items.description: A Colorado funeral home owner has taken a plea deal after stashing nearly 190 decaying bodies in a bug-infested building

items.title: California law to protect Jewish students faces challenge over free speech concerns
items.description: The American-Arab Anti-Discrimination Committee is challenging a new California law designed to protect Jewish students from discrimination

items.title: Hearings to focus on National Guard deployments in the nation's capital and Memphis, Tennessee
items.description: Hearings are set in two states over the deployment of the National Guard as part of President Donald Trump's crime-fighting efforts

items.title: Flight delays persist as government shutdown leads to air traffic controller shortages
items.description: Flight delays are continuing at U.S. airports amid air traffic controller shortages as the government shutdown enters its second month

items.title: Tariffs are Trump's favorite foreign policy tool. The Supreme Court could change how he uses them
items.description: For President Donald Trump, tariffs — or the threat of them — can bend nations to his will
